item.title: 639 Run help!
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Hello moparscape users! :D. I’ve been trying to get eclipse working… I changed the IP in the runclient.java to my no-ip, and in my run.bat. Here is both of my codes that i changed.

My Run.bat:

@echo off "C:/program files/java/jdk1.6.0_18/bin/java.exe" -cp clientlibs.jar; RunClient ---->My IP put here<----

My RunClient.java:

[code]public class RunClient extends Applet implements ActionListener {

private Robot robot;
private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
public static Properties params = new Properties();
public JFrame mainFrame;
public JPanel mainPane = new JPanel();
public static String mainurl = "Changed to my IP";
public int lang = 0;
public String frameName = "My Server Name 639 Client";
public JPanel totalPanel;
private JMenuBar menuBar = new JMenuBar();
private int capNum;
private FilenameFilter filter = new FilenameFilter() {

[/code]
EDIT: When i run the client it says " error_game_js5connect ".

Could someone please help? This is my first 639 rsps ;o… I’ve normally been dealing with 562’s and stuff. Never once dealt with a eclipse 639 source/client. Rep++ For help, thanks :).

Read full topic
